info.name: Sorting: odd-even network
info.description:
The most basic sorting for GPU. And slowest one. O(n) frames.

NOTE: we sort full image as a single linear array to show HOW SLOW this method really is.
99120 frames for 420x236, at 60 FPS: 1652 seconds = 23.5 minutes.
Or many hours for full-screen. :-)
